file_insights.changes_summary: Updated skeleton grid layout to be responsive
file_insights.impact: Improves mobile user experience by adjusting grid layout based on screen size

patterns_discovered.description: Using MUI sx prop with breakpoint-based gridTemplateColumns object instead of fixed grid values
patterns_discovered.benefit: Provides responsive design that adapts from single column on mobile (xs) to 3-column grid on medium screens and up (md)

patterns_discovered.description: Using Skeleton components within responsive grid containers for loading states
patterns_discovered.code_example: Box wrapping multiple Skeleton components mapped over array
patterns_discovered.benefit: Maintains consistent loading UI across different viewport sizes

gotchas_discovered.description: Using object notation with breakpoint keys (xs, sm, md, lg, xl) in sx prop requires understanding MUI's breakpoint system
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Reference MUI documentation for default breakpoint values and ensure consistent usage across components

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully made AuditLogPage skeleton grids responsive by implementing MUI's breakpoint-based responsive design pattern
approach_outcome.details: Changed fixed 3-column grid layout to responsive layout that displays as single column on extra-small screens (xs) and 3-column grid on medium screens and above (md)

recommendations.recommendation: Audit other pages for similar fixed grid layouts
recommendations.rationale: This responsive grid pattern should be consistently applied across the application where multi-column layouts exist
Ensure team consistency in using xs/md breakpoints vs other breakpoint options for similar components

recommendations.recommendation: Consider testing responsive layout across devices
recommendations.rationale: Verify that the single-column to 3-column transition provides good UX at various screen sizes
